news.title: British man in seat 11A is only passenger to survive India plane crash
news.summary: Vishwashkumar Ramesh is believed to have survived the Air India crash that killed at least 200 people.

news.title: Verified video shows Air India plane descending and moment of crash
news.summary: A plane bound for London Gatwick carrying 242 people has crashed after taking off from Ahmedabad in India.

news.title: What we know so far about Air India flight AI171
news.summary: More than 200 people were on board the flight to London Gatwick when it crashed shortly after take-off.

news.title: Watch: BBC journalist shows devastation on the ground
news.summary: "The scale of devastation on the ground is just massive" says BBC South Asia correspondent Yogita Limaye.

news.title: What does the crash mean for Boeing?
news.summary: Until Thursday's tragic Air India crash in Ahmedabad, Boeing's 787 Dreamliner had an exemplary safety record.

news.title: Families hid in attics during 'racist' disorder in Northern Ireland
news.summary: There have been three days of violence in Ballymena and other towns, leading to 13 arrests.

news.title: Legal win for son tricked into moving to Africa by parents
news.summary: The boy travelled to Ghana from London in March 2024 after being told a relative was ill.

news.title: Thunderstorm warnings in place as drought declared for millions
news.summary: Temperatures on Friday will likely match the previous hottest day of 2025 so far.

news.title: Six Gaza aid boat activists deported from Israel after three days in detention
news.summary: Their boat was intercepted on Monday as they attempted to break Israel's naval blockade on Gaza and deliver a symbolic amount of aid.

news.title: Reeves refuses to rule out tax rises after economy shrinks
news.summary: The chancellor highlights "uncertainty" in the world as economists warn of tax rises if the economy fails to grow.
